product_name: Timex Expedition Scout Metal Watch - Men's
long_description: The durable Timex Expedition Scout Metal Watch combines classic analog styling with durable water resistance and the comfort of a soft fabric band. INDIGLO night light; luminous hands and markers; mineral glass crystal; comfortable and durable nylon strap. The Timex Expedition Scout Metal Watch is water-resistant to 50m (165 ft.).
short_description: The durable Timex Expedition Scout Metal Watch combines classic analog styling with durable water resistance and the comfort of a soft fabric band.
